Container.Name: StorjNode-V3
Container.Overview:
Stroj Labs Storage Node V3 network. https://www.storj.io
This is Storj Lab's V3 node client. To participate you must first have to have an authorization token, to join waitlist go to: https://storj.io/sign-up-farmer
This template is for running the Docker application only, please follow Storj Lab directions in the Auth Token email link to setup your Node Identity files - this is under "Setup" on https://github.com/storj/storj/wiki/Storage-Node-Setup-Instructions

Config.Name: Email address
Config.Description: Email address used to sign Storj V3 node.

Config.Name: Internet Address
Config.Description: Your ISP IP address:28967 (static IP) or dynamic DNS address here.

Config.Name: Bandwidth
Config.Description: Amount of bandwidth used, per month, to Storj network. According to Storj documentation, minimum is 2TB, recommended is 16+ TB, preferred is unlimited

Config.Name: Allocated Storage
Config.Description: A minimum of 500GB with no maximum of available space per node. Preferred minimum of 8TB and maximum of 24TB of available space per node.

Config.Name: Storage-dir
Config.Description: replace to the user share where you want Storj data to be stored.
